columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address.
columns.line_1_number_building: The first line of the address including number and building name.
columns.town_city: The name of the town or city associated with the address.
columns.zip_postcode: The postal code for the address, aiding in location identification.
columns.state_province_county: The state, province, or county of the address.
columns.country: The name of the country where the address is located.

Addresses.table_description: The table stores detailed information for each address entry.

columns.service_id: The unique identifier for each service entry.
columns.service_type_code: The category code indicating the type of service offered.
columns.service_name: The name of the specific service provided.
columns.service_descriptio: The detailed description outlining the service's purpose.

Services.table_description: The table catalogs various government services and their details.

columns.form_id: The unique identifier for each form entry.
columns.form_type_code: The code indicating the complexity level of the form.
columns.service_id: The identifier linking the form to its related service.
columns.form_number: The unique number assigned to each form for reference.
columns.form_name: The official name of the form used in submissions.
columns.form_description: The detailed explanation describing the form's purpose.

Forms.table_description: The table holds information on various government forms and their attributes.

columns.individual_id: The unique identifier for each individual.
columns.individual_first_name: The first name of the individual.
columns.individual_middle_name: The middle name of the individual, if applicable.
columns.inidividual_phone: The contact phone number of the individual.
columns.individual_email: The email address used for communication.
columns.individual_address: The complete address of the individual.
columns.individual_last_name: The last name of the individual.

Individuals.table_description: The table contains personal information for individuals in the database.

columns.organization_id: The unique identifier for each organization.
columns.date_formed: The date and time when the organization was established.
columns.organization_name: The official name of the organization.
columns.uk_vat_number: The VAT registration number of the organization in the UK.

Organizations.table_description: The table registers details for various organizations in the database.

columns.party_id: The unique identifier for each party.
columns.payment_method_code: The method of payment used by the party.
columns.party_phone: The contact phone number for the party.
columns.party_email: The email address for communication with the party.

Parties.table_description: The table stores information related to parties involved in transactions.

columns.individual_id: The unique identifier for each individual connected to an organization.
columns.organization_id: The unique identifier for each organization involved.
columns.date_contact_from: The date when the contact with the individual began.
columns.date_contact_to: The date when the contact with the individual ended.

Organization_Contact_Individuals.table_description: The table tracks contact history between individuals and organizations.

columns.party_id: The unique identifier for each party involved.
columns.address_id: The unique identifier for each address associated with the party.
columns.date_address_from: The date when the party started using the address.
columns.address_type_code: The code indicating the type of address used by the party.
columns.date_address_to: The date when the party ceased using the address.

Party_Addresses.table_description: The table links parties to their addresses and tracks usage dates.

columns.party_id: The unique identifier for each party involved in the form submission.
columns.form_id: The unique identifier for each form associated with the party.
columns.date_completion_started: The date when the party began the form completion process.
columns.form_status_code: The current status of the form in the completion process.
columns.date_fully_completed: The date when the form was fully completed, if applicable.

Party_Forms.table_description: The table tracks the forms submitted by various parties and their statuses.

columns.booking_id: The unique identifier for each service booking.
columns.customer_id: The unique identifier for the customer making the booking.
columns.service_id: The unique identifier for the service being booked.
columns.service_datetime: The scheduled date and time for the service.
columns.booking_made_date: The date and time when the booking was made.

Party_Services.table_description: The table records service bookings made by customers and their details.
